item.title: Multi-domain Modeling in Ads
item.description: For ML-powered advertisement systems, When building a big model to serve all the different businesses and channels, it is really important to make your model aware of the distinction between different domains. Here we present two papers from Alibaba which solve the problem of multi-domain learning in the field of online ads.
